name: platform_ID
description: Identifier for the GOES satellite. Possible values are "G16" and "G17". Currently, "G16".

name: orbital_slot
description: Designated operating slot for the satellite. Possible values are "GOES-East", "GOES-West", "GOES-Test", and "GOES-Storage". Currently, "GOES-East".

name: time_coverage_start
description: Date and time of the first data point in the dataset (UTC). Format is YYYY-MM-DD”T”HH:MM:SS.s”Z”.

name: time_coverage_end
description: Date and time of the last data point in the dataset (UTC). Format is YYYY-MM-DD”T”HH:MM:SS.s”Z”.

name: date_created
description: Date and time when dataset file was created (UTC). Format is YYYY-MM-DD”T”HH:MM:SS.s”Z”.

name: group_time_threshold
description: Lightning group maximum time difference among lightning events in a group in seconds.

name: flash_time_threshold
description: Lightning flash maximum time difference among lightning events in a flash in seconds.

name: event_count
description: Count number of lightning events in product.

name: group_count
description: Count number of lightning groups in product.

name: flash_count
description: Count number of lightning flashes in product.

name: percent_navigated_L1b_events
description: Percent of lightning events navigated by instrument after false event filtering.

name: percent_uncorrectable_L0_errors
description: Percentage of data lost due to uncorrectable L0 errors.

name: total_size
description: Size of the underlying .nc file(s) in bytes.

name: base_url
description: Location in Google Cloud Storage for the underlying source file.
